PageInfo.Message:
<COL 78f5ff>"Monster Gathering Spots" have been
added!</COL>
In the "Monster Gathering Spots," enemies gather
and the Demon Army's bases develop as the days
pass.
As the Demon Army's bases develop, stronger
enemies will start to appear.

When the Demon Army base reaches its maximum
development, a special enemy called a <COL
ffdc78>Spot Boss</COL> appears.
Defeating the Spot Boss allows you to obtain a
tremendous amount of experience points compared to
other enemies.
Note: If the days pass while the Spot Boss is
defeated, the development stage of the Demon Army
base will return to its initial state.
